semantic_description: Add proper RabbitMQ OpenTelemetry instrumentation so that publish/consume spans with standard messaging attributes appear in Jaeger for the clm-web service.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue or exchange name passed to the RabbitMQ.Client API (e.g., 'queueName' parameter)

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the semantic action being performed, e.g., 'publish' or 'consume', inferred from the RabbitMQ.Client method being invoked

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the routingKey argument used in the basic publish call

attributes_to_add.name: correlation_id
attributes_to_add.value_source: the value extracted from the message properties or the CorrelationToken variable in scope
